resources.string: The Chatter extension for Dashclock requires a rooted device and root access to work. Uninstall the extension, or, root your device and grant root access permanently.
Displays information about your unread messages from multiple apps.
The Chatter extension for Dashclock was unable to find any message databases. Contact the developer in order to resolve this issue.
Displays information about your unread WhatsApp conversations
Displays information about your unread Hangouts conversations
Displays information about your unread Facebook conversations
